name: sportline
description: NCAAM betting CLI with parlay EV ranking

scripts.db:query:seasons:ncaam: sqlite3 data/sportline.db "SELECT DISTINCT season FROM games WHERE sport='ncaam' ORDER BY season DESC;"
scripts.db:query:seasons:cfb: sqlite3 data/sportline.db "SELECT DISTINCT season FROM games WHERE sport='cfb' ORDER BY season DESC;"
scripts.db:query:seasons:nfl: sqlite3 data/sportline.db "SELECT DISTINCT season FROM games WHERE sport='nfl' ORDER BY season DESC;"
scripts.db:query:seasons:nba: sqlite3 data/sportline.db "SELECT DISTINCT season FROM games WHERE sport='nba' ORDER BY season DESC;"
scripts.db:query:seasons:nhl: sqlite3 data/sportline.db "SELECT DISTINCT season FROM games WHERE sport='nhl' ORDER BY season DESC;"
scripts.db:list:seasons: sqlite3 data/sportline.db "SELECT DISTINCT sport,season FROM games ORDER BY sport, season;"
scripts.all: npm i && npm run build && chmod +x dist/index.js && npm link
scripts.db:ingest:full: npm run ingest:cfb:full && npm run ingest:ncaam:full && npm run ingest:nba:full && npm run ingest:nfl:full && npm run ingest:nhl:full
scripts.ingest:cfb:full: for y in 2020 2021 2022; do sportline data ingest --sport cfb --season $y; done
scripts.ingest:ncaam:full: for y in 2020 2021 2022 2023; do sportline data ingest --sport ncaam --season $y; done
scripts.ingest:nba:full: for y in 2024 2025; do sportline data ingest --sport nba --season $y; done
scripts.ingest:nfl:full: for y in 2022 2023 2024 2025; do sportline data ingest --sport nfl --season $y; done
scripts.ingest:nhl:full: for y in 2023 2024 2025; do sportline data ingest --sport nhl --season $y; done
scripts.train:moneyline:ncaam: node dist/index.js model train --sport ncaam --season 2019,2020,2021,2022,2023,2024,2025 --markets moneyline
scripts.train:moneyline:cfb: node dist/index.js model train --sport cfb --season 2024,2025 --markets moneyline
scripts.train:moneyline:nfl: node dist/index.js model train --sport nfl --season 2022,2023,2024,2025 --markets moneyline
scripts.train:moneyline:nba: node dist/index.js model train --sport nba --season 2023,2024,2025 --markets moneyline
scripts.train:moneyline:nhl: node dist/index.js model train --sport nhl --season 2023,2024,2025 --markets moneyline
scripts.train:moneyline: npm run train:moneyline:ncaam && npm run train:moneyline:cfb && npm run train:moneyline:nfl && npm run train:moneyline:nba && npm run train:moneyline:nhl
scripts.backtest: node dist/index.js model backtest --sport ncaam --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport cfb --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nfl --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nfl --season 2024,2025 --market total && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nba --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nba --season 2024,2025 --market spread && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nba --season 2024,2025 --market total && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nhl --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline
scripts.update: npm run build && node dist/index.js data daily && npm run train && node dist/index.js results && node dist/index.js stats && cp data/sportline.db ../sportline.db && node -e 'const s=(process.env.UNDERDOG_SPORTS||"nfl,nba,cfb,ncaam,nhl").split(","); const {execSync}=require("node:child_process"); for (const sport of s) { console.log("üêï Updating underdog for", sport); execSync("node dist/index.js underdog train --sport " + sport + " --seasons 2021,2022,2023,2024,2025 --tiers moderate", {stdio: "inherit"}); }'
